verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* concerning all the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* which \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, which \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Migdol|strong="H4024"\w*, and at \w Tahpanhes|strong="H8471"\w*, and at \w Noph|strong="H5297"\w*, and in the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Pathros|strong="H6624"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Ye have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that I have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* upon \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and upon all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; and, behold, this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \add are\add* a \w desolation|strong="H2723"\w*, and no man \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* therein,

\w Because|strong="H6440"\w* of their \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* which they have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* to provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*, in that they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w*, \add and\add* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, whom they \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not, \add neither\add* they, ye, nor your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Howbeit I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto you all my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, rising \w early|strong="H7925"\w* and \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \add them\add*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Oh, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* not this \w abominable|strong="H8441"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that I \w hate|strong="H8130"\w*.

But they \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not, nor \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* their \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* to \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from their \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, to burn no \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

Wherefore my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* and mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was poured \w forth|strong="H5413"\w*, and was \w kindled|strong="H1197"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and they are \w wasted|strong="H2723"\w* \add and\add* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, as at this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Therefore now thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Wherefore \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* ye \add this\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, to cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from you \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w child|strong="H5768"\w* and \w suckling|strong="H3243"\w*, \w out|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, to \w leave|strong="H3498"\w* you none to \w remain|strong="H7611"\w*;\f + \fr 44.7 \ft out…: Heb. out of the midst of Judah\f*

In that ye provoke me unto \w wrath|strong="H3707"\w* with the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, burning \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, whither ye be \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w*, that ye might cut yourselves \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, and that ye might be a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* and a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* among all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*?

Have ye \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and your own \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, and the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of your \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, which they have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*?\f + \fr 44.9 \ft wickedness…: Heb. wickednesses, or, punishments, etc\f*

They are not \w humbled|strong="H1792"\w* \add even\add* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, neither have they \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*, nor \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, nor in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, that I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 44.10 \ft humbled: Heb. contrite\f*

¶ Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Behold, I will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against you for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and to cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that have \w set|strong="H7760"\w* their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* to \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* there, and they shall all be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*, \add and\add* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; they shall \add even\add* be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \add and\add* by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*: they shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, from the \w least|strong="H6996"\w* even unto the \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w*, by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* and by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*: and they shall be an \w execration|strong="H0423"\w*, \add and\add* an \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w*, and a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*, and a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.

For I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, as I have \w punished|strong="H6485"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and by the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*:

So that none of the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which are \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* there, shall \w escape|strong="H6412"\w* or \w remain|strong="H8300"\w*, that they should \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, to the which they \w have|strong="H5375"\w* a \w desire|strong="H5315"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* there: for none shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* but such as shall \w escape|strong="H6405"\w*.\f + \fr 44.14 \ft have…: Heb. lift up their soul\f*

¶ Then all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* which \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* that their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* had burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and all the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* that stood \w by|strong="H5975"\w*, a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w multitude|strong="H6951"\w*, even all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, in \w Pathros|strong="H6624"\w*, \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\add As for\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto us in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, we will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto thee.

But we will \w certainly|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* whatsoever \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of our own \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, to burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto the \w queen|strong="H4446"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and to pour \w out|strong="H5258"\w* drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* unto her, as we have \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, we, and our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, our \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, and our \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: for \add then\add* had we \w plenty|strong="H7646"\w* of \w victuals|strong="H3899"\w*, and were \w well|strong="H2896"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* no \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 44.17 \ft queen…: or, frame of heaven\f*\f + \fr 44.17 \ft victuals: Heb. bread\f*

But since we left \w off|strong="H2308"\w* to burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* to the \w queen|strong="H4446"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and to pour \w out|strong="H5258"\w* drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* unto her, we have \w wanted|strong="H2637"\w* all \add things\add*, and have been \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* and by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*.

And when we burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* to the \w queen|strong="H4446"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and poured \w out|strong="H5258"\w* drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* unto her, did we \w make|strong="H6213"\w* her \w cakes|strong="H3561"\w* to \w worship|strong="H6087"\w* her, and pour \w out|strong="H5258"\w* drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* unto her, \w without|strong="H1107"\w* our \w men|strong="H0582"\w*?\f + \fr 44.19 \ft men: or, husbands?\f*

¶ Then \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to the \w men|strong="H1397"\w*, and to the \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which had given him \add that\add* \w answer|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

The \w incense|strong="H7002"\w* that ye \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, ye, and your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, your \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, and your \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, did not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* them, and \w came|strong="H5927"\w* it \add not\add* into his \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*?

So that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* no longer \w bear|strong="H5375"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w evil|strong="H7455"\w* of your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, \add and\add* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* which ye have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*; therefore is your \w land|strong="H0776"\w* a \w desolation|strong="H2723"\w*, and an \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w*, and a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*, without an \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*, as at this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H6440"\w* ye have burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w*, and because ye have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and have not \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, nor \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, nor in his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, nor in his \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w*; therefore this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* is \w happened|strong="H7122"\w* unto you, as at this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Moreover \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and to all the \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* that \add are\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*; Ye and your \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* have both \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* with your \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w* with your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, We will \w surely|strong="H6213"\w* \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* our \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* that we have \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w*, to burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* to the \w queen|strong="H4446"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and to pour \w out|strong="H5258"\w* drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* unto her: ye will \w surely|strong="H6965"\w* \w accomplish|strong="H6965"\w* your \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, and \w surely|strong="H6213"\w* \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* your \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*.

Therefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; Behold, I have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by my \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall no more be \w named|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* in all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*.

Behold, I will \w watch|strong="H8245"\w* over them for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and not for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: and all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* that \add are\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* and by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, until there be an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of them.

Yet a \w small|strong="H4962"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* that \w escape|strong="H6412"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall return \w out|strong="H7725"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and all the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that are \w gone|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* there, shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* whose \w words|strong="H1697"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, mine, or theirs.\f + \fr 44.28 \ft mine…: Heb. from me, or, from them\f*

¶ And this \add shall be\add* a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* unto you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* you in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, that ye may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H6965"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* against you for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Pharaoh-hophra|strong="H6548"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of them that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* his \w life|strong="H5315"\w*; as I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, his \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, and that \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* his \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.
